name: Gloucester Luk Kwok Hong Kong

reviews.text: -location( very close to metro station, many restaurants around)
reviews.title: Not bad, but better value for money in the area

reviews.text: -restaurant(chinese restaurant in the hotel was good)
reviews.title: Very Nice!
Good quality small hotel in good location

reviews.text: -room was just average. But I do not know if this is hong kong average or not.( One side of view is better) and average cleaness. But nothing was uncomfortable.
reviews.title: Nice hotel in a convenient Wanchai location

reviews.text: In this particular note, I would like to review the experience I had during my stay at Hotel Luk Kwok in Hong Kong. It was my first visit to the city state Hong Kong SAR. I had to travel to the nice country for official meeting purpose. I requested our business counterparts in Hong Kong to suggest a good hotel & they suggested me to book a room for myself in this hotel as it is at walking distance from their office on Hennessey Road.
reviews.title: Nice Affordable Hotel in HK

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed here several times and find its location to be great for shopping, nightlife and restaurants at any time of the day or night! The service is efficient and polite. It is good value. We booked one of their renovated rooms described as Deluxe on their website. In our opinion, it was worth spending the extra dollars for the upgraded decor and amenities. The room was spacious, however we found the bed to be not so comfortable as the mattress sloped to the centre and if one person moved, everything moved! That aside, we would still stay here again, due to its other positive points.
reviews.title: Great Location, Comfortable and Clean Hotel
Nice location
reviews.text: The hotel is located in Wanchai, many pubs, restaurants and clubs in walking distance. Luk Kwok was renovated in 2008 (or so). Prices are very competitive compared to other hotels in HK!

We spent 3 nights here over Easter 2010 and were pretty happy. The hotel is well cared for - clean and smart. We had a decent room looking towards the harbour (we could see a few boats and a bit of Kowloon through the tall buildings!). The service was very good, with staff quick to respond to requests. I particularly liked that this felt like an Asian hotel - not one of your standard Western chains.
reviews.title: Good hotel, great value for money

reviews.text: The real attraction was the price. We paid HKD980 a night for two including breakfast - about half what similar hotels in the Wan Chai and Causeway Bay areas were charging.
reviews.title: Surprisingly Good

aka: Gloucester Luk Kwok Hong Kong Hotel Hong Kong
description: Gloucester Luk Kwok Hong Kong is a super-value hotel located in the heart of Wanchai business district which is within few minutes walk to reach the Hong Kong Convention & Exhibition Centre. With its close proximity to the MTR Wanchai Station, it brings guests every convenience to gain access to all parts of Hong Kong.
